description: Master registry for all High Mountain Taxi account programs

accounts.name: Aspen Highlands District HOA

scripts.claire_confirmation: This ride's covered by your Highlands District HOA. Tips are cash if you'd like.
scripts.customer_asks_about: The Highlands program covers rides to downtown, the airport, and the hospital.
scripts.not_eligible_destination: That destination isn't covered by the Highlands program. This'll be a regular metered ride.
scripts.not_eligible_time: That time is outside the Highlands program hours.

accounts.instructions_template: HOA Highlands - FREE RIDE, cash tips only
accounts.notes: One end must be Highlands District address. Very minimal wait time - district doesn't pay for late passengers.

accounts.name: Five Trees

scripts.claire_confirmation: This ride's covered by Five Trees. Tips are cash if you'd like.
scripts.customer_asks_about: Five Trees covers rides to downtown, the airport, and the hospital.
scripts.not_eligible_destination: That's outside the Five Trees coverage area. This'll be a regular metered ride.

accounts.instructions_template: Five Trees - FREE RIDE, cash tips only
accounts.notes: One end must be Five Trees address. Very minimal wait time.

accounts.name: Snowmass Village Dial-a-Ride

scripts.claire_confirmation: This qualifies for Snowmass Village Dial-a-Ride. It's just a dollar per person, and we collect that when the driver picks you up.
scripts.customer_asks_about: Snowmass Dial-a-Ride is a dollar per person for trips within Snowmass Village.
scripts.customer_no_cash: No worries if you don't have cash — we'll work it out with the driver.

accounts.instructions_template: SNOWMASS DIAL-A-RIDE - Collect ${{passenger_count}} ($1 per person x {{passenger_count}} passengers)
accounts.notes: One end must be OFF the Snowmass Village shuttle route. 8 AM - 9 PM throughout winter season. Town doesn't pay wait time. Write number of people on voucher.

accounts.name: Aspen Country Inn

scripts.claire_confirmation: Since you're crossing the highway, Aspen Country Inn covers this ride. Tips are cash if you'd like.
scripts.not_eligible_reason: That's a regular metered ride — Aspen Country Inn only covers rides when you have to cross Highway Eighty-Two.
scripts.customer_asks_about: Aspen Country Inn covers rides when you need to cross Highway 82 - there's no tunnel to the bus stop on the downvalley side.

accounts.instructions_template: ASPEN COUNTRY INN - Free ride (crossing Hwy 82), cash tips only
accounts.notes: Free if crossing Highway 82. Common routes: ACI to/from Inn at Aspen, Airport/ABC, Brush Creek Park & Ride. NOT free: ACI to downtown Aspen (can take bus without crossing 82). Customer must have ACI voucher.

accounts.name: Tipsy Taxi

scripts.claire_confirmation: Got it—Tipsy Taxi. That's our free ride program. We'll get you home safe.

accounts.instructions_template: TIPSY TAXI - Free ride, impaired passenger

special_rules.medical_emergency_guidelines: Call 911 if passenger can't walk, respond, is throwing up, had injury, or is combative

accounts.notes: COMPLETELY FREE - voucher from police/sheriff/bartender. For intoxicated passengers being taken home safely. NEVER mention fare or cost. NEVER ask for payment.

accounts.name: Senior Dial-a-Ride

scripts.claire_confirmation: That qualifies for our Senior Dial-a-Ride program. It's half price — you'd pay half in cash, we cover the other half.
scripts.customer_asks_about: Our Senior Dial-a-Ride is half off any ride from Aspen to the surrounding area. You pay half, we cover half.

accounts.instructions_template: SENIOR DIAL-A-RIDE - Customer pays 50% cash, voucher covers 50%
accounts.notes: Senior citizens only. ANY TIME including weekends. Customer pays 50% of meter in cash. Other 50% on voucher. Cash tips accepted. Can use manual credit card form if no cash.

accounts.name: Emergency Ride Home

scripts.claire_confirmation: Got it — Emergency Ride Home program. That's covered. Where are you headed?
scripts.customer_asks_about: Emergency Ride Home is for workers who normally bus but need a backup. You need a voucher from the program.

accounts.instructions_template: EMERGENCY RIDE HOME - Metered + 20% tip charged to program

special_rules.allows_one_stop: hospital, daycare, schools on way home
special_rules.distance_limit: Redstone on Highway 133 or Silt on I-70

accounts.notes: For workers who normally take RFTA bus. Emergency situations where bus isn't available. Customer must have ERH voucher. Metered + 20% tip charged to program.

accounts.name: Hotel Jerome

scripts.claire_if_customer_asks: Let me check with your front desk if this goes on your hotel account.

accounts.notes: 330 E Main Street, Aspen. Rarely used. Must be arranged by Hotel Jerome front desk or bell stand. Metered, tip at discretion of front desk/bell stand.

accounts.name: The Gant

scripts.claire_if_customer_asks: I can put this on The Gant account if your front desk approved it.

accounts.notes: 610 S West End Street, Aspen. Must be arranged by front desk OR customer must ask for account. Metered, tip at discretion of front desk (sometimes cash).

accounts.name: Dancing Bear

scripts.claire_if_customer_asks: I can set this up on your Dancing Bear account if the front desk arranged it.

accounts.notes: 205 S Galena Street, Aspen. Must be arranged by front desk. Metered + 20% tip. Usually early morning ASE transfers.

accounts.name: Mollie Aspen

scripts.claire_if_customer_asks: I can set this up on your Mollie account if the front desk approves it. They're open twenty-four seven.

special_rules.requires_signature: All vouchers need legible signature from front desk (open 24/7)

accounts.notes: 101 W Main Street, Aspen. Must be arranged by front desk OR customer must ask. Metered + 20% tip. All vouchers need legible signature from front desk (open 24/7).

accounts.name: Stonebridge Inn

scripts.claire_if_customer_asks: I can put this on your Stonebridge Inn account if the front desk approved it.
scripts.disambiguation: Just to confirm — Stonebridge Inn or Stonebridge Condos?

accounts.notes: 300 Carriage Way, Snowmass Village. Must be arranged by front desk OR customer must ask. Metered + cash tip. IMPORTANT: Confirm which property - Inn or Condos.

accounts.name: Stonebridge Condos

scripts.claire_if_customer_asks: I can put this on your Stonebridge Condos account if the front desk arranged it.
scripts.disambiguation: Just to confirm — Stonebridge Condos or Stonebridge Inn?

accounts.notes: Snowmass Village (different from Stonebridge Inn). Must be arranged by front desk. Metered + cash tip.

accounts.name: Timbers Club

scripts.claire_if_customer_asks: I can set this up on your Timbers Club account. Are you a guest or staff?

accounts.notes: Snowmass Village. DO NOT VOLUNTEER. Metered + 20% tip. Usually ASE transfers, staff transport.

accounts.name: Whitman Fine Properties

scripts.claire_if_customer_asks: I can put this on your Whitman Fine Properties account if they arranged it.

special_rules.when_wendy_or_ryan: When Wendy or Ryan is passenger, they can add any tip on account

accounts.notes: Various rental properties managed by Whitman. Metered + cash tip (for guests). Special: When Wendy or Ryan is passenger, they can add any tip on account.

accounts.name: Limelight Hotel Aspen

scripts.claire_should_ask: Is the front desk putting this on your hotel account?
scripts.claire_if_yes: I'll put this on your Limelight account.
scripts.claire_if_no: No problem, we'll bill it normally.

accounts.notes: 355 S Monarch Street, Aspen. ASK if pickup from hotel. Must be arranged by front desk OR approved upon arrival. Metered + 20% tip. Usually ASE transfers, moving between Limelight locations, skier transport.

accounts.name: Limelight Hotel Snowmass

scripts.claire_should_ask: Is the front desk putting this on your hotel account?
scripts.claire_if_yes: I'll put this on your Limelight account.
scripts.claire_if_no: No problem, we'll bill it normally.

accounts.notes: 65 Wood Road, Snowmass Village. ASK if pickup from hotel. Must be arranged by front desk OR approved upon arrival. Metered + 20% tip. Usually ASE transfers, moving between Limelight locations.

accounts.name: Aspen Meadows

scripts.claire_should_ask: Are you putting this on your hotel account or paying directly?
scripts.claire_if_hotel: I'll put this on your Aspen Meadows account.
scripts.claire_if_direct: No problem, we'll bill it directly.

accounts.notes: 845 Meadows Road, Aspen. ASK if pickup from hotel. Use if entitled. Metered + 20% tip. Usually ASE transfers and Aspen crosstown. NOT eligible for Highlands HOA program.

accounts.name: Laurelwood

scripts.claire_confirmation: Laurelwood to the airport is a flat sixty dollars. Sound good?

voucher.notes: Not HMT voucher. If no voucher, get name and room number - office will obtain voucher

accounts.notes: Snowmass Village. FLAT $60 ($50 + $10 tip) for ASE transfers ONLY. Uses LAURELWOOD VOUCHER (not HMT voucher). If no voucher, get name and room number - office will obtain voucher.

accounts.name: Timberline

scripts.claire_confirmation: Timberline to the airport is a flat sixty dollars.

accounts.notes: FLAT $60 ($50 + $10 tip). Similar to Laurelwood.

accounts.name: Frias Properties

scripts.claire_if_customer_mentions: Got it — Frias property. I'll need your exact rental address.

accounts.notes: Various rental properties. Metered + cash tip. Need exact address and/or unit number. Usually ASE pickup → Frias office for keys → rental unit.

accounts.name: Aspen Signature Properties

scripts.claire_if_customer_mentions: Got it — Signature Properties rental. What's your exact address?

accounts.notes: Various rental properties. Metered + 15% tip. Need exact address and legible passenger name. Rarely used.

accounts.name: Little Nell

scripts.claire_should_ask: Is the front desk putting this on your hotel account?
scripts.claire_if_yes: I'll put this on your Little Nell account.
scripts.claire_if_no: No problem, this will be a regular fare.

accounts.notes: 675 E Durant Ave, Aspen. Element 47 and Ajax Tavern are part of Little Nell property.

accounts.name: St. Regis Aspen

scripts.claire_should_ask: Is the front desk putting this on your hotel account?
scripts.claire_if_yes: I'll put this on your St. Regis account.
scripts.claire_if_no: No problem, we'll bill it normally.

accounts.notes: 315 E Dean St, Aspen. Luxury 5-star property.
